title: Purpose of Wars of Religion painting

content.question: Based on the imagery and intended audience of Vasari’s painting, the artist’s most likely purpose was to portray the events in the painting as

choices.label: a horrific abuse of royal power
a cautionary tale against the dangers of mob violence
